about_the_game:
Introduction

"Wow! This ice cream..."

I looked in the direction of the voice and saw a sweet-looking girl standing beside me, looking at the ice cream in my hand with stars in her eyes.

"Sorry, miss, the last one has been bought by the gentleman just now."

She seemed to be negotiating something with the clerk, glancing at the ice cream in my hand from time to time, with regret on her face.

So I paid the money, handed her the untouched ice cream and left without looking back.

Doing good things without leaving a name, fulfilling the girl's wish, today's merits are added.

I never thought that I would see the girl again during the company interview in the afternoon.

Her almond eyes widened slightly, pointing at me and exclaimed: "Hey——! Ice cream! "

Wait, when did I become ice cream?

Game Background

A Fascinating Story: Ice Cream is a spin-off of A Fascinating Story. It tells the story of the sweet and quiet junior Zhen Tian and the protagonist Zhang Wei.

Although they met because of ice cream, perhaps, caring for this well-behaved junior is more than just an ice cream.

Gameplay

In the game, you need to flip the cards with the mouse. The ultimate goal is to find two cards with the same pattern and eliminate them; conversely, if the flipped card pictures are inconsistent, there will be no change. When all the cards on the screen are cleared, you can pass the level and unlock more character pictures.
